shortdesc.ph: Used to aggregate statistics for each network path in multipath transmission.
Used to aggregate statistics of each network path in multipath transmission.
Used to summarize statistics of each network path in multipath transmission.
Used to aggregate statistics of each network path in multipath transmission.
